contents: 2. leaves 15b-44b: Kitāb al-Alfīyah fī ʻilm al-ḥadīth.
3. leaves 45b-48a: [Asānīd for canonical ḥadīth collections] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzī al-ʻĀmirī al-Shāfiʻī.
4. leaves 49b-50b: Muqaddimah fī bayān alfāẓ tadūru bayna al-muḥaddithīn.
5. leaves 52b-54a: [Ijāzah, 1517, for Aḥmad ibn Jābir al-Dimashqī al-Ḥarīrī al-Muqrī al-Shāfiʻī] / Ibn Ṭūlūn.
6. leaves 56b-58b: [Ijāzah for Ismāʻīl ibn Ibrāhīm al-Juʻfī] / Ibn Ṭūlūn.
12. leaves 100b-102a: Fatwá fī al-nuhūḍ wa-al-alqāb wa-al-inḥināʼ.
15. leaves 136b-142a: [Ijāzah for al-Malik al-Muẓaffar] / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
18. leaves 150b-152a: Juzʼ fīhi jawāb ʻan kalām Ibn al-Jawzī fī qiṣṣat Abī Bakr wa-ʻUmar.
19. leaves 153b-172a: Badʼ al-ʻulqah fī lubs al-khirqah.
subject: Muslim scholars—Certification—History—13th century—Sources
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
